title: 92NY Presents: Podcrushed LIVE (with Modern Loveâ€™s Anna Martin)
description:
[From 92NY] "Join us for an intimate evening as the hosts of the hit podcast Podcrushed â€” acclaimed actor Penn Badgley (Netflixâ€™s YOU), Nava Kavelin and Sophie Ansari â€” sit down with Modern Love host Anna Martin to explore the tender, turbulent terrain of adolescence and its lasting impact on our lives. Podcrushed has captured audiences with its thoughtful exploration of the formative experiences that shape us â€” from first crushes and social anxieties to family dynamics and identity formation. Through vulnerable conversations with artists, writers, and celebrated cultural figures, hosts Badgley, Kavelin, and Ansari have created a sanctuary for revisiting the most transformative moments of our youth. In this special conversation, hear them with beloved New York Times Modern Love podcast host Anna Martin for a night of storytelling about the universal threads that connect our coming-of-age experiences."

Joe Manganiello (True Blood, Deal or No Deal Island) is a reknowned heartthrobâ€” but did you know heâ€™s also a certified, almost-skipped-two-grades, dungeons&dragons master, nerd? Joe regales us with stories of his almost unbelievable tween years juggling his academic gifts with his athletic prowess and a burgeoning passion for the arts. He opens up about why honoring a family legacy of survival is so important to him, and why becoming a dad could be his most exciting role yet. 

Our full episode with Joe Manganiello is out on all audio platforms now! Full video episode coming tomorrow.

title: Tyler James Williams | Ep. 75 | Podcrushed
description:
Tyler James Williams (Abbott Elementary, Dear White People, Everybody Hates Chris) tells stories of jumping over tables to impress his middle school crush, recalls memories of how he quelled his own internalized feelings of rejection from his years playing a reject on television, and offers his philosophy on how film sets with both adult and child actors should run.

title: [Rerun] Conan O'Brien
description:
Today we're rerunning one of our favorite interviews from Season 1! Conan O'Brien (SNL, Late Night, Conan) comes by to discuss his "need" for friendship and what it was like being the tall, lanky redhead in middle school in Boston. He also tells the group about the beginnings of his career in comedy at Harvard, SNL and more. Stick around to hear about his family's obsession with Gossip Girl and his thoughts on how the show ended.

title: Brittany Snow | Ep. 74 | Podcrushed
description:
Brittany Snow (Pitch Perfect, Hairspray) joins the gang and shares stories from her decades-long career in Hollywood. Brittany shares details about the extreme lengths she went to in order to succeed as a child actor, and how her own struggles with relationships and body image influenced her directorial debut, Parachute. She and Penn dish on the John Tucker Must Die sequel rumors, and share their favorite memories from set.

title: Love Life with Matthew Hussey | Podcrushed | Ep 70
description:
New York Times Best-Selling Author of Get the Guy and Love Life, and the world's foremost dating coach, Matthew Hussey joins us this week to share insight into his personal journey of confidence and clarity in relationships. He offers straightforward advice on how to find a long-term partner, how to avoid the avoided (and how to tame the avoider within!)

title: Matthew Hussey Wants You to Have the Hard Conversation
description: The world's most renowned dating coach, NYT Best-Selling Author, Matthew Hussey offers insight into why it can feel so hard to express our needs in an open, direct conversation, and why it's vital to do it anyway.

title: Daisy Ridley Flies Solo with Penn | Ep. 69 | Podcrushed
description: For the first time in the history of Podcrushed, Penn flies solo with our guest, Daisy Ridley (Star Wars Trilogy, Murder on the Orient Express). She gushes over her first big crushes on Pink and Julia Stiles, how pain shaped part of her adolescence, and the role that intuition played in landing her, a then-unknown actress, the most coveted role of the 2010s as Rey in Star Wars: The Force Awakens. They also take a deep dive into her more recent foray into independent films, including her latest role as the first woman to ever swim the English Channel in Young Woman and the Sea.

title: Daisy Ridley knew she was going to land the job
BJ Novak in the You-verse?! | Podcrushed | Ep. 68 | Podcrushed
description: Today the gang chats with B.J. Novak, the actor, writer, and all-around comedic force from films like Inglorious Basterds and The Founder, and shows like The Mindy Project, The Newsroom, and The Office. He recounts summer camp crushes, his slow realization that he was funny, and the prank that made him a Boston legend.

title: HOST EPISODE | Let's talk about friendship | Podcrushed
description: In the first of several themed AMA's this season, Penn, Sophie and Nava tackle timeless questions, like "would you forgive a friend who cheated with your partner while high?",  "would you publicly out a cheating spouse?", and "should you let your friends know about all their annoying habits?" Nava recalls her most traumatic friend breakup, Sophie shares how she saved a friendship from drifting too far apart and Pennâ€¦ is there. Tune in and get ready for some extra laughs this week.

title: Karamo Brown talks reality TV & fatherhood | Podcrushed | Ep. 66 | Podcrushed
description: This week we are blown away by Karamo Brown (Queer Eye, Karamo Show), whose life consists of a series of plot twists almost too-incredible to believe. Karamo opens up about living authentically at school while hiding himself at home, how a one-time encounter with his best friend turned into the greatest plot twist of his adult life, why life after MTV's The Real World was almost unbearable, and how he managed to land his role on Queer Eye even though he missed every round of casting but the last.

title: How Karamo Brown protested his way to Real World
description: This week we are blown away by Karamo Brown (Queer Eye, Karamo Show), whose life consists of a series of plot twists almost too-incredible to believe. In this week's episode (out now on audio) Karamo opens up about living authentically at school while hiding himself at home, how a one-time encounter with his best friend turned into the greatest plot twist of his adult life, why life after MTV's The Real World was almost unbearable, and how he managed to land his role on Queer Eye even though he missed every round of casting but the last.

title: Jake Johnson follows his gut | Podcrushed | Ep. 64 | Podcrushed
description: We couldn't be more excited to kick things off in Season 3 with the one and only Jake Johnson (New Girl, Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse)! Jake reflects on the trauma of being called "little boy!" in front of his crush, how his mother's intuition saved him from going to juvie, and why you should always listen to your gut, even when you're wrong sometimes. He also reminisces about his time on New Girl and what excites him most about switching things up behind the camera.

title: Relationship Myth Busting #podcast #pennbadgley #relationship
The Rise of Artificial Intimacy  #podcast #relationship #shorts
Esther Perel on Love, Conflict, and Human Connection | Podcrushed | Ep 64 | Podcrushed
description:
In our penultimate episode of the season, we interview the trailblazing, renowned psychotherapist and relationship expert, Esther Perel. We learn about her new course "Turning Conflict into Connection," and Esther shares her profound wisdom on love, conflict, and human connection. She leads us in answering personal questions from her new game "Where Should We Begin", while she shares personal stories of worst dates and delicate family dynamics. title: Seth and Josh Meyers, Our Most Wholesome Guests | Podcrushed | Ep 62 | Podcrushed
description:
Seth Meyers (SNL, Late Night) and Josh Meyers (Mad TV, That 70s Show) join us this week for a wholesome and hilarious conversation on their Midwestern upbringing. title: Ramy Youssef's Life as a Muslim Kid in Post-9/11 New Jersey | Ep 60 | Podcrushed
description:
*** RE-UPLOAD! If you watched the video we previously posted, check out this video for the last 10 minutes. *** Come join us as Penn falls thoroughly in love with our guest, Ramy Youssef (award-winning actor, producer, and stand-up comic). Ramy shares what it was like to be a Muslim kid in New Jersey the day after 9/11, why he loves Jesus but won't eff with Santa, and why in middle school he literally would have rather shit his pants than miss out on a good time. **This episode was recorded prior to the SAG-AFTRA strike.** For more Podcrushed, subscribe to our YouTube channel: https://bit.ly/PodcrushedSubscribe

title: All Things Parenting with Erin and Bob Odenkirk | Ep 57 | Podcrushed
description:
Today we have not one, but two guests -- Bob Odenkirk, the award-winning actor, writer, and comedic trailblazer whose career has spanned decades, and his daughter Erin Odenkirk, an accomplished multimedia artist and illustrator. Together they co-authored a book of childrenâ€™s poems and illustrations called â€˜Zilot & Other Important Rhymesâ€, which manages to entertain while also encouraging children to write their own poems. Bob tells us why he still sometimes feels like a fourteen-year-old, Erin tells stories of growing up in the uber-creative Odenkirk household, and the hosts finally discover what exactly a "zilot" is. title: Romance, Fame, and Philanthropy with Kevin Bacon | Ep 56 | Podcrushed
description:
This week we get to experience Kevin Bacon in the first degree! Kevin tells us all about his new podcast, Six Degrees with Kevin Bacon, how his mother influenced his passion for philanthropy, and how he came out of the womb seeking attention. Kevin shares why fame doesn't bother him (too much), how he draws inspiration for his spirited Tik Tok account, and most significantly, finally agrees to share a piece of marriage advice. For more Podcrushed, subscribe to our YouTube channel: https://bit.ly/PodcrushedSubscribe

title: Bobby Berk Says You Should Make Your Bed | Ep 53 | Podcrushed
description:
Our guest this week is the one and only Bobby Berk (Queer Eye, Nailed It!). Bobby shares about his road to self discovery, from coming out to his family and church community as a teen, to finding his passion for art and design. He shares about how he manifested the Fab 5 with a group chat before final casting of Queer Eye, the time he almost punched a fan by accident, the principles of design that his new book Right at Home, explores, and why making your bed every morning can make or break the rest of your day. For more Podcrushed, subscribe to our YouTube channel: https://bit.ly/PodcrushedSubscribe

title: Taylor Momsen | Ep 52 | Podcrushed
description:
** This episode was recorded prior to the SAG-AFTRA strike**. Our guest this week is none other than Taylor Momsen (The Pretty Reckless, Gossip Girl). She and Penn reunite for the first time since filming the season finale of Gossip Girl in 2012. Taylor shares what it was like being the youngest actor on set, her impressions of working with Penn, and why it was important for her to give her all to pursuing a career in music. Taylor lets us in on her creative muses, how she's drawn inspiration from the darkest moments of her life, and how she's learned to pick herself up after facing heartbreaking losses. For more Podcrushed, subscribe to our YouTube channel: https://bit.ly/PodcrushedSubscribe

title: Sebastian Stan | Ep 16 | Podcrushed
description:
In this season 1 throwback, listen in on the conversation we had with actor Sebastian Stan (Gossip Girl, Captain America, Avengers, etc.). Penn and Seb reminisce about heartbreak during their time on Gossip Girl and how acting forces them to question things. Sebastian also shares how it was to learn English through acting, and the group ponders how to navigate friendship and competition in the entertainment industry.

title: Taylor Tomlinson | Ep 49 | Podcrushed
description:
You may know her from her viral Netflix specials, "Quarter Life Crisis" and "Look at You", but this week's guest, the bright, witty, and ludicrously funny Taylor Tomlinson, feels duped! She thought she was coming on for a breezy conversation on first periods and childhood crushes, and instead found herself deep in a conversation on heartbreak, rejection, death, and mental illness. The hosts hold nothing back, too, this week as they reflect on sudden loss and middle school trauma. This is a special episode of Podcrushed you won't wanna miss. title: Nina Dobrev | Ep 47 | Podcrushed
description:
**This episode of Podcrushed was recorded prior to the SAG-AFTRA strike.** Nina Dobrev (Vampire Diaries) stops by the pod to share recollections from her early adolescence, including her time as a substitute on the national Canadian gymnastics team, navigating Canadian culture under a strict Bulgarian upbringing, and recognizing how recreating family-seeking patterns in romantic relationships was preventing her from finding real love.Â For more Podcrushed, subscribe to our YouTube channel: https://bit.ly/PodcrushedSubscribe

title: Nina Dobrev on Her Early Childhood Journey | Podcrushed
description:
This week, we welcome Nina Dobrev, best known for portraying Elena Gilbert and Katherine Pierce on the supernatural drama series The Vampire Diaries. During our conversation, Nina opens up about her unique upbringing, which was marked by frequent moves between Bulgaria and Canada, leading to feelings of instability during her formative years. She also delves into her early artistic pursuits as a high energy child, sharing her journey from gymnastics to the world of performing arts. title: Lilly Singh | Ep 40 | Podcrushed
description:
Lilly Singh -- YouTube icon, author, actor, and the first female late-night host in over 30 years -- drops by the pod and impresses the hosts with her wit, warmth, and depth. From her middle school obsession with Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson, to the obstacles she faced in late night, to why she'll still be anxiously seeking her mother's approval on her death bed -- Lilly does not hold back! For more Podcrushed, subscribe to our YouTube channel: https://bit.ly/PodcrushedSubscribe

title: Shay Mitchell | Ep 10 | Podcrushed
description:
In this early episode from season 1, actress Shay Mitchell joins us. Shay fascinates us with the incredible way she manifested literally everything she wanted in her life, down to what her baby looks like. She looks back on her time in middle school with a little PTSD and shares how motherhood has made her look back on her own childhood with a different perspective. title: Elizabeth Lail | Ep 30 | Podcrushed
description:
Today we're joined by Elizabeth Lail, who you may know as Beck from YOU. Elizabeth shares why middle school was the worst time of her life, but how acting gave her both a sense of safety and freedom. title: Sebastian Stan On Acting | Podcrushed Clip
description:
The talented Sebastian Stan stops by the studio and talks about his life and career. For more Podcrushed, subscribe to our YouTube channel: https://bit.ly/PodcrushedSubscribe

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Welcome to the official YouTube channel for Podcrushedâ€“ the podcast where Penn Badgley reads your middle school stories. Podcrushed explores the heartbreak, anxiety and self-discovery of being a teenager. Hosts Penn Badgley, Nava Kavelin, and Sophie Ansari discuss your embarrassing, hilarious, and sweet middle school memoriesâ€“ from childhood crushes, to battles with body hair, to schoolyard scuffles. The results are sometimes awkward, sometimes heartwarming, and always relatable. Donâ€™t miss our episodes with amazing guests like Jenna Ortega, Adam Brody, and Sophia Bush. 

On this channel youâ€™ll find special clips from interviews, full video episodes on Thursdays, and any other fun videos we can convince Penn to take part in.

Subscribe to our channel, turn on post-notifications, and never miss another episode: https://bit.ly/PodcrushedSubscribe
